products.title: Turin 25mm Sandy Beige Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of turin 25mm aluminium perfect fit venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A warm tone, this sandy beige perfect fit venetian blind adds a warm cream shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are drill and screw-free, designed for upvc windows and doors, and protects the frame warranty.

products.description: Amid brown shade, thehoney oak 25mm perfect fit blindboasts elegance in any window. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.
